data.text: Bicycle Pump Failure when Long-Distance Cycle Touring

When is the last time that you checked your bicycle pump? The lowly pump that we carry on our bicycle so that when we get a flat tire we can change or patch the tube in the field to get home. If you have a pump that you have not used for a year or longer, take a minute and go put a pound or two of air into your tube to make sure that the pump still works. I have had a flat, replaced the tube and then found out that the pump did not work because something failed in the pump. It was a total drag and a long ride home on a flat tire ;<(
They are greased inside, to keep things sliding. Maybe it just hardened. I fixed a couple of pumps by cleaning and regreasing them
